description: Enhanced blueprint for extracting directional survey data from well reports with comprehensive header information and survey measurements

MD.instruction: Measured depth of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

Incl.instruction: Inclination of the wellbore at the survey point in degrees - extract from survey data table

TVD.instruction: True vertical depth of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

VS.instruction: Vertical section of the wellbore at the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

Azim.instruction: Azimuth of the wellbore at the survey point in degrees - extract from survey data table

NS.instruction: Northing coordinate of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

EW.instruction: Easting coordinate of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

Clsr_Dist.instruction: Closure distance from the surface location in feet - extract from survey data table

Clsr_Azi.instruction: Closure azimuth from the surface location in degrees - extract from survey data table

Dog_Leg.instruction: Dogleg severity at the survey point in degrees per 100 feet - extract from survey data table

Tool.instruction: The survey tool used to collect the data at this point - extract from survey data table

Operator.instruction: Name of the well operator - look in the header section at the top of the document

Field.instruction: Name of the oil/gas field - look in the header section at the top of the document

Well_Name.instruction: Complete well name including lease and well number - look in the header section

Well_Site_Name.instruction: Well site or location name - look in the header section

Date.instruction: Survey date or report date - look in the header section

Survey_Provider.instruction: Company that provided the directional survey services - look in the header section

NE_Reference.instruction: North-East coordinate reference system used - look in header or reference section

Vertical_Reference.instruction: True Vertical Depth reference datum (e.g., KB, GL, MSL) - look in header section

VS_Reference.instruction: Vertical Section reference direction or target - look in header section

Survey_Calculation_Method.instruction: Mathematical method used for survey calculations (e.g., Minimum Curvature) - look in header section

Ground_Level.instruction: Ground level elevation value and units - look in header section

North_Reference.instruction: North reference type (e.g., True North, Magnetic North, Grid North) - look in header section

Grid_Convergence.instruction: Grid convergence angle value - look in header section

MD.instruction: Measured depth of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

Incl.instruction: Inclination of the wellbore at the survey point in degrees - extract from survey data table

TVD.instruction: True vertical depth of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

VS.instruction: Vertical section of the wellbore at the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

Azim.instruction: Azimuth of the wellbore at the survey point in degrees - extract from survey data table

NS.instruction: Northing coordinate of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

EW.instruction: Easting coordinate of the survey point in feet - extract from survey data table

Clsr_Dist.instruction: Closure distance from the surface location in feet - extract from survey data table

Clsr_Azi.instruction: Closure azimuth from the surface location in degrees - extract from survey data table

Dog_Leg.instruction: Dogleg severity at the survey point in degrees per 100 feet - extract from survey data table

Tool.instruction: The survey tool used to collect the data at this point - extract from survey data table

Header_Information.instruction: Extract all well identification and operator information from the document header

Survey_References.instruction: Extract all coordinate and reference system information from the header section

Directional_Survey_Data.instruction: Extract only the directional survey measurements from the survey data table
